prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a tiny blue alien creature, large pointed ears, blue and red jester hat, blue imperial tunic with frills, wide face, smooth skin, tiny stature
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, rubbery biological blue skin, realistic fabric texture on jester hat and tunic, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, human face, regular human height, plastic, doll, low quality, deformed hat
